name: Frenchie Quest
description:
Frenchie Quest is a platform adventure game about my 2 French Bulldogs named Ganon and Loki. Choose your French Bulldog Knight and embark on an adventure across a mysterious island where you’ll face many different creatures, monsters and other sorts of trouble.

With over 30 challenging levels, you’ll solve puzzles, fight monsters, collect coins, buy items and upgrades … all the good stuff you’d expect in the most Epic French Bulldog Game ever!

PLEASE NOTE: The Screenshots are of the Mobile Game ONLY, the Desktop version has no on-screen mobile controls and supports keyboard or game-pads.

See more pictures & video of Ganon & Loki on their website and youtube channel!

http://www.frenchiequest.com

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC8Sx2pqtzmhkiJKYbakfuPw
